summary: The document is a declassified communication under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing a message from Rio de Janeiro to 'BELL' concerning Cuban Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs Carlos Olivares's planned visit to Brazil around 20 May. The purpose of the visit was to discuss the Cuban Revolution, with a specific request for a summary of derogatory information on Olivares for high-level liaison and advice on his travel.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It involves a communication about Cuban Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs Carlos Olivares's intentions to discuss the Cuban Revolution in Brazil.
There is a request for derogatory information on Olivares and advice regarding his travel plans.
